ReaperArt_ToolDesc: Leap up performing a powerful overhead attack.
WandererArt_ToolDesc: Thrust forward and launch a flurry of attacks.
BeastArt_ToolDesc: Lunge forward and rapidly strike forward.
WitchArt_ToolDesc: Send whips out while spinning around.
ArchitectArt_ToolDesc: Attack with a large drill-like strike.
DuelistCrest_Desc: Attack with precise thrusts, equip multiple Needle Arts at once.
